name: PHAssetChangeRequest
desc: A request to create, delete, change metadata for, or edit the content of a Photos asset, for use in a photo library change block.

items.name: class func creationRequestForAsset(from: UIImage) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a request for adding a new image asset to the Photos library.

items.name: class func creationRequestForAssetFromImage(atFileURL: URL) -> Self?
items.desc: Creates a request for adding a new image asset to the Photos library, using the image file at the specified URL.

items.name: class func creationRequestForAssetFromVideo(atFileURL: URL) -> Self?
items.desc: Creates a request for adding a new video asset to the Photos library, using the video file at the specified URL.

items.name: var placeholderForCreatedAsset: PHObjectPlaceholder?
items.desc: A placeholder object for the asset that the change request creates.

items.name: class func deleteAssets(NSFastEnumeration)
items.desc: Requests that the specified assets be deleted.

items.name: init(for: PHAsset)
items.desc: Creates a request for modifying the specified asset.

items.name: var creationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time at which the asset claims to have been originally created.

items.name: var location: CLLocation?
items.desc: The location information saved with the asset.

items.name: var isFavorite: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset is marked as one of the user’s favorites.

items.name: var isHidden: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset is hidden in collections.

items.name: var contentEditingOutput: PHContentEditingOutput?
items.desc: The output of an asset content editing session.

items.name: func revertAssetContentToOriginal()
items.desc: Request to revert any edits made to the asset’s content.
